name: Disrupto!
description:
This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2020!
Disrupto! is a top-down 2D game where you have to use your disruptor to get past the houses' suspiciously advanced security systems. 

take care not to trip the alarms, or it's back to the streets for you!

Rob all items from the smaller houses to get access to the big mansion!

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Enter doors, use stairs, and pick up valuables

Space: Use disruptor

Credits:

  • Programming/Gameplay design: Dennis B
  • Art/Menu design: Aiden K
  • level design: Aiden K, Tom V
  • Foley/Gameplay testing: Sebastian K, Jaromy S
  • original music score by: Sem S
